process.title: How the Design for Good Initiative Works
process.description: We've streamlined the agency process into three simple steps â€” built to support fast-moving teams with big missions and small budgets.

steps.title: Discovery & Strategy
steps.description: We start by understanding your mission, goals, and target audience through comprehensive research and strategic planning sessions.

steps.title: Concept Development
steps.description: Our creative team develops innovative concepts and design directions that align with your mission and objectives.

steps.title: Design & Refinement
steps.description: We craft pixel-perfect designs with meticulous attention to detail, iterating based on your feedback until perfection.

steps.title: Launch & Support
steps.description: We deliver final assets and provide ongoing support to ensure your design solutions perform at their highest potential.

cta.title: Start Your First Request Today
cta.subtitle: No contracts. No risk. Just mission-first design support.
